name: refreeze
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to freeze something such as food again: It is okay to refreeze food when it has not thawed completely? After defrosting the chicken, do not re-freeze. Most campsites will have a place for you to refreeze your ice packs overnight.
(of snow or ice) to freeze or be frozen again: The snow melts and re-freezes with sharp edges like shattered glass. Officials strongly discouraged travel, saying the icy weather would refreeze slush and water on roads.
More examplesFewer examplesAvoid refreezing defrosted meat that is held at room temperature for more than two hours.This could be a sign that the fish has been thawed and refrozen.Never try to refreeze ice cream that has melted completely.If previously cooked foods are thawed in the refrigerator, you may refreeze the unused portion.The ice has now refrozen several times and become very hard.Without the sun's warming action, the ice-caps re-freeze and sea levels fall again.
